Uses of Class
nachos.userprog.UserProcess

Packages that use UserProcess
nachos.network Provides classes that allow Nachos processes to communicate over the network. 
nachos.userprog Provides classes that allow Nachos to load and execute single-threaded user programs in separate address spaces. 
nachos.vm Provides classes that allow Nachos processes to be demand paged, and to use a hardware TLB for address translation. 
 

Uses of UserProcess in nachos.network
 

Subclasses of UserProcess in nachos.network
 class NetProcess
          A VMProcess that supports networking syscalls.
 

Uses of UserProcess in nachos.userprog
 

Fields in nachos.userprog declared as UserProcess
 UserProcess UThread.process
          The process this thread belongs to.
 

Methods in nachos.userprog that return UserProcess
static UserProcess UserKernel.currentProcess()
          Returns the current process.
static UserProcess UserProcess.newUserProcess()
          Allocate and return a new process of the correct class.
 

Constructors in nachos.userprog with parameters of type UserProcess

Uses of UserProcess in nachos.vm
 

Subclasses of UserProcess in nachos.vm
 class VMProcess
          A UserProcess that supports demand-paging.
